attributes.action: Strip Philip Green of his Knighthood
attributes.background: His knighthood was for his contribution to UK Retail.  His motivation  has not been to Retailing, but to inflate his already over inflated bank balance.  The collapse of BHS and its Pension shortfall, is a national disgrace, which falls solely at his feet, so strip him of his knighthood.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
